sdata.j: もし↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓↑用↑↓よう↓↑食料↑↓しょくりょう↓が↑数↑↓すう↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓にそこに|↑到達|↑↓とうたつ↓しなければ、↑何↑↓なに↓↑千↑↓せん↓↑人↑↓にん↓もの↑命↑↓いのち↓が↑危険↑↓きけん↓になるだろう。
sdata.e: Thousands of lives will be at stake if emergency food does not arrive there within a few days.

sdata.e: How did you arrive at such a conclusion?

sdata.e: A piece of railway in use today is therefore the product of a long series of decisions reached at different times for many different reasons.

sdata.j: ↑今↑↓いま↓までだれもその↑山↑↓やま↓の↑頂上↑↓ちょうじょう↓に|↑到達|↑↓とうたつ↓できていない。
sdata.e: No one has been able to reach the top of the mountain.

sdata.e: No one has been able to reach the top of the mountain.

sdata.e: Armstrong was the first man to reach the moon.

sdata.e: After six hours' climbing, we finally succeeded in reaching the top of the mountain.

sdata.e: I succeeded in reaching the top of the mountain.
